title: shouts
author: shouts
content: Have you heard of Shouts - Decentralized social network?Recently appeared, looking way more powerfull than Mastadon, Bluesky or any other.Check it out and tell me what you think: https://shouts.social

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: shouts on June 17, 2023, 08:22:00 AMHave you heard of Shouts - Decentralized social network?Recently appeared, looking way more powerfull than Mastadon, Bluesky or any other.Check it out and tell me what you think: https://shouts.socialIf you are the official representative I'm sure you are, you should create an official announcement for your token and post it here Announcements. comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Good name honestly and if you're trying to develop that, it's going to be a long way to go until you reach a certain number of members that are actively joining your social media.I've seen a lot of social media projects that didn't become successful and that's why this is like a hard niche of focus for a project. I mean every niche is hard when there are big existing companies that are already dominating it. You'll be having a hard time introducing it to the market but you'll need certain time and activeness for you guys to get a lot of active users.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: A Web 3.0-based social media platform that provides absolute anonymity would make all the people on this forum happy, but these things don't interest the rest of the world too much. For this reason, such projects that have been tried before did not succeed. People persist in using crappy places like Twitter or Facebook. To be honest, I don't think you can get people's attention because of the strong influence of concepts like popularity and habit.Also, there are known websites like Coinmarketcap and Coingecko in our partners section of your website. I couldn't find any verification on Coinmarketcap and Coingecko. Being listed on Coinmarketcap and Coinecko is commonplace for cryptocurrencies. I don't think it's the right thing to show this as a partnership. However, I would like to say that I like the design of Shouts. I think you did a good job on this. I wish you and your project the best of luck.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: shouts on June 17, 2023, 08:22:00 AMHave you heard of Shouts - Decentralized social network?Recently appeared, looking way more powerfull than Mastadon, Bluesky or any other.Check it out and tell me what you think: https://shouts.socialIf you are this project representative, I recommend that you create another trend that can be qualified as announcement thread since you are obviously doing this to promote your project.I have saw so many social media type project but I haven't seen one that really succeed or made people use their platform constantly. Most of them are old simply copycats of our current social media which doesn't really make people become interested since a established social media is always available.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: shouts on June 17, 2023, 08:22:00 AMHave you heard of Shouts - Decentralized social network?Recently appeared, looking way more powerfull than Mastadon, Bluesky or any other.Check it out and tell me what you think: https://shouts.socialHaven't heard of it, not downplaying though, but it's going to be a lot of work on your end if you wanted to be the next Twitter. And we have seen a lot of social media's way back in 2017-2018 era wherein they also says that they are the "next this and that". But after the hype of 2017, everything just died down and most of them are gone now or have reinvented themselves.So again, just keep the fire burning in you if you really wanted to compete on this very tough niche.Competitions everywhere so your marketing is a big part of it.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: even once the title is a failure situation. Because if you want to create a social network, you should create it uniquely, not as an alternative to another social media. As soon as you say this, people automatically become cold. If you want to be successful, you must first get rid of these illusions and similarities. In general, many projects emerged under the name of social media and disappeared from the market with failures. I hope you can be successful.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: shouts on June 17, 2023, 08:22:00 AMHave you heard of Shouts - Decentralized social network?Recently appeared, looking way more powerfull than Mastadon, Bluesky or any other.Check it out and tell me what you think: https://shouts.socialIf you’re connected with the team better to make a formal announcement, this could be a great project so we want to see the highlights of this site and of course the advantage of a decentralized social platform. We know how Twitter is being corrupted by many scammers, so I think this is a good idea to have a decentralized platform where scammer can no longer be allowed. Though Twitter is too bit to be replaced that easily but I think there’s still a chance for a new social platform, you just need to be more innovative and secured.

comments.author: 20kevin20
comments.body: I think a social network that pays you to post is quite a bad idea and attracts spam and very unnecessary posts. There’s already a lot of people trying to make themselves famous online - imagine you told them they could monetize their Twitter posts lol..Anyway, didn’t we have a lot of attempts at creating such a network in the past? One of them being Faketoshi’s? I honestly think there isn’t much potential there tbh.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Wow it pretty much cool but why not make the site a bit lighter because is very heavy to load completely from my end, I don't know if is from my network or a general problem which everyone is experiencing from their end. Few people above had already made the right suggestion for you on what to do.. Although this isn't the right way to launch your project over here, it should be more concise instead posting for people to view it, I doubt if percentage of people will visit it because they might be afraid of phishing site.
